definition: to inspect/to review/to read/to peruse/to go through/to experience
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: I have done away with my Bloglines account.
sentences.chinese: 我已經扔掉了自己在線閱讀器的帳號。

sentences.english: All the other eReaders will be substantially more expensive, with the cheapest Kindle clocking in at $299.
sentences.chinese: 其他電子書閱讀器都要貴得多。

sentences.english: CAJA reader software, the method effective, easy to understand.
sentences.chinese: CAJA閱讀器的軟件，該方法效果好，易理解。

sentences.english: Feedly, at its core, is an app for Google Reader.
sentences.chinese: 其核心是一個用於Google閱讀器的應用。

sentences.english: Most of the feed readers provide keyboard shortcuts.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的閱讀器都會提供快捷鍵。

sentences.english: First, lets separate RSS readers from the format.
sentences.chinese: 首先，把閱讀器和版式分開。

sentences.english: This will open the advertisers web page on top of the ad viewer.
sentences.chinese: 此時將會在閱讀器頂部打開廣告頁面。
我從不使用任何電子閱讀器。

sentences.english: However, the feature can add a great deal of value to an e-reader.
sentences.chinese: 但是，添加在電子閱讀器中就有很大的價值。

sentences.english: The web-based reader acts as a synchronization server.
sentences.chinese: 基本web的閱讀器就像一個同步服務器。

sentences.english: They're good for the environment, convenient and compact enough to be portable.
sentences.chinese: 電子閱讀器的優點是環保，輕巧和攜帶方便。

sentences.english: Why do you use the "Reader" to reade-book?
sentences.chinese: 請問你爲什麼使用“閱讀器”來閱讀？

sentences.english: Some firms are responding by launching e-readers based on LCD technology.
sentences.chinese: 一些公司順勢發佈了基於LCD技術的電子閱讀器。

sentences.english: I will then use this new filtered event reader to parse the document.
sentences.chinese: 接下來我使用這個新的事件過濾閱讀器解析文檔。

sentences.english: This provides a way for screen readers to understand the dynamic update of the contents.
sentences.chinese: 這使屏幕閱讀器能夠理解內容的動態更新。

pinyin: quan2 qiu2 ding4 wei4 xi4 tong3
